meanings.definition: The quality or state of being newfangled.
meanings.sent1: Her excitement over the newfangledness of the smartphone was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The newfangledness of the invention impressed the entire town.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa couldn't understand the newfangledness of the internet, but he tried to learn.
meanings.sent4: The newfangledness of the electric car revolutionized the automotive industry.
meanings.sent5: The newfangledness of the technology left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The tendency to adopt new or modern ideas.
meanings.sent1: His newfangledness in trying out the latest gadgets always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was due to its newfangledness in marketing strategies.
meanings.sent3: Sarah's newfangledness in fashion made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The newfangledness of the team's approach led to groundbreaking innovations.
meanings.sent5: The newfangledness of the concept sparked a wave of creativity in the industry.
